name: OUT OF Control (Diab)
description:
Hello!

Out of control is our first gamejam'game for Apsi and me. We have place the game in a horror's place: a forest where some kids are camping. But something happen...

SO this is our first gamejam's game and... is hard. We will update the game in the next few days because some elements are missing. The project was too bigger for only 2 days.. But this is a good experimentation and it's not the last!

Hope u like it and make comments if you want!
